articles.title: Prince Harry leaving official duty means door open for Lady Louise on cusp of adulthood - Express
articles.description: PRINCE Harry's step back from the Royal Family last year may have opened up a space for teenage Lady Louise Windsor to slip into as she gears up for an important decision on her future place in the Firm.
